segments.text: Morning , Mary . I haven't seen you in a long time . What's up ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I took up a new hobby .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So you don't travel a lot now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , Frank . I'm much more interested in collecting stamps now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's certainly a popular hobby . I know a lot of people love stamps .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It certainly is . It's so much fun .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I believe collecting stamps has something similar to traveling right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Absolutely . Through all kinds of stamps I am able to learn about the world .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , every stamp has a story to tell .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You're right . And I also meet many new friends while collecting stamps .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sometimes we even spend hours discussing our collections .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There's a lot to share when you have a common interest .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , it's really amazing . I got to go now . I'm meeting with some other collectors .
segments.speaker: S2
